title: EdenMind — Plant problem diagnosis and care plan generator

requirements.text: Create the EdenMind app core flow: collect plant information from the user (plant type/name, environment, watering habits, visible symptoms) and generate a clear diagnosis summary plus a cure/treatment plan and ongoing care instructions.

quotes: Cria um aplicativo de inteligência artificial que cria solução de cura para tua planta e diz como você deve cuidar o  nome é EdenMind a.a

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend provides a form with fields for plant type/name, light exposure, watering frequency, and free-text symptoms/observations.
Submitting the form calls a backend method and shows results without a page reload.
Results include (at minimum): likely issue(s), confidence/likelihood indicator, treatment steps, and ongoing care checklist.

requirements.text: Implement a deterministic, on-chain 'AI-like' plant health analyzer in Motoko that maps user-provided symptoms and care context to likely issues and produces structured recommendations.

quotes: Cria um aplicativo de inteligência artificial que cria solução de cura para tua planta e diz como você deve cuidar o  nome é EdenMind a.a

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a single public method that accepts a structured input (plant type/name, environment, watering, symptoms) and returns a structured result (issues, rationale, treatment steps, care plan).

Analyzer handles at least these common problem categories: overwatering/root rot, underwatering, low light, sunburn, nutrient deficiency, pests (e.g., aphids/spider mites), fungal disease, and temperature stress.
Returned guidance is safety-aware (e.g., avoids suggesting prohibited chemicals; includes general cautions like isolating pest-infected plants).
All Motoko logic remains in the single main actor file per platform constraints.

requirements.text: Build the results UI to present the EdenMind output in a readable, actionable format with sections for: Diagnosis, Why this is likely, Treatment plan (step-by-step), and Ongoing care (do/don’t checklist).
acceptanceCriteria: Results page/section renders returned structured fields with clear headings and lists.
Treatment steps are displayed as an ordered list; ongoing care is displayed as checklist-style items.
UI includes a 'Start over' action to run a new analysis.

requirements.text: Add a coherent visual theme for EdenMind and apply it consistently across the app (typography, spacing, color palette, components). Use an earthy botanical style (greens, warm neutrals) and avoid blue/purple as primary colors.
acceptanceCriteria: App uses a consistent botanical theme (e.g., green/earth palette, soft surfaces) across form and results.
Theme is applied via Tailwind styling and existing UI components without modifying immutable UI component source files.
All user-facing text in the UI is in English and uses the name “EdenMind”.

requirements.text: Generate and include basic static brand/hero imagery for EdenMind and render it from frontend static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (no backend image routing).
At least a logo and a hero/banner image are visible in the app shell/home screen.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not integrate external LLM/AI APIs; the 'AI' behavior must be implemented within the app using deterministic logic.
nonGoals: Plant photo upload and image-based diagnosis.
Real-time chat interface with an AI assistant.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.
Storing long-term user histories/records unless explicitly requested later.

required: Botanical wordmark logo reading “EdenMind” with a minimal leaf/seedling motif, flat vector style, transparent background (edenmind-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Soft botanical hero/banner illustration with leaves/houseplant silhouette, warm neutral background, no text (edenmind-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
